pinyin: zhong4 gua1 de2 gua1 , zhong4 dou4 de2 dou4

definitions.zhong4 gua1 de2 gua1 , zhong4 dou4 de2 d: lit. Sow melon and you get melon, sow beans and you get beans (idiom); fig. As you sow, so shall you reap.; One must live with the consequences of one's actions.; You've made your bed, now must lie on it.;
